subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Cervelo’s Heinrich Haussler, who holds German and Australian citizenship, won the second stage of the Tour de Suisse, a 103-mile route from Ascona to Sierre.
snippet: Cervelo’s Heinrich Haussler, who holds German and Australian citizenship, won the second stage of the Tour de Suisse, a 103-mile route from Ascona to Sierre.
